cause.description:
Gun trotting religious fanatics believe they can change the world. Mebbe they can, but not for the better. Help us spread hope to all around us who suffer this politically motivated and territory capturing rampage. Is this the way the world ends?
1. Kashmir has bled for generations.India is bleeding with it.
2. Has violence ever been the Answer?
cause.mission: Free the world from Gun Politics
cause.name: Against Terrorism
